name: Dishonored: Game of the Year Edition
name_original: Dishonored: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Dishonored: Game of the Year Edition is an action game developed by Arkane Studios. It came out on 08-10-2013. Bethesda Softworks published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Dishonored: Game of the Year Edition is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
